actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on knitted or crocheted fabrics of a width exceeding 30 cm, containing by weight 5 percent or more of elastomeric yarn but not containing rubber thread.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on knitted or crocheted fabrics of a width exceeding 30 cm, containing by weight 5 percent or more of elastomeric yarn but not containing rubber thread.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on knitted or crocheted fabrics of a width exceeding 30 cm, containing by weight 5 percent or more of elastomeric yarn but not containing rubber thread.
